definitions.text: a written assurance that some product or service will be provided or will meet certain specifications
an unconditional commitment that something will happen or that something is true
examples: there is no guarantee that they are not lying

definitions.text: a collateral agreement to answer for the debt of another in case that person defaults

examples: I vouch for the quality of my products
This nest egg will ensure a nice retirement for us

definitions.text: stand behind and guarantee the quality, accuracy, or condition of
examples: The dealer warrants all the cars he sells
